channel.title: Code-Magic - Where dreams become reality
channel.description:
So, I am here to post our new project we'll be working on. [b]Code-Magic.[/b]
Code-Magic is a server which is still in development (early stage). We are looking to give players a good community which is stable, free of trolling/flaming/whatsoever, and with a professional staff team. Currently we have: - A set of minigames (Barrows, Tzhaar, duel arena) - Godwars - KBD - Corp - Tormented Demons - Frost Dragons - Bork - Strykewyrms - Grand Exchange (not a custom one) - 22 out of 24 skills are working (currently working on Construction and Dungeoneering) - Clans with Clan Chat - Drygore Weapons - Prayers and Curses - Custom Minigame (it is part of an event we will be running) - Quests (Working on a few to start with, continuing them depending on user feedback) - More to come, and ofcourse we're not giving out everything just yet :)
Some Pictures: [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/9025/ix7e.png[/img] Drygores
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img189/3039/we7p.png[/img] Grand Exchange
More to be added later :)
Credit Time! [b]Raw Envy - Base[/b] [b]Whoever deserves credit but didn't get it, post here and i'll add you.[/b]
OH, and before I forget, Credits to Jacob and Mod Skyro from Rising Elements for [b]TRYING TO STEAL OUR NAME[/b]. [img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/1663/33c9.png[/img]
Note: [b]These people aren't linked with us in any way.[/b]

item.title: Code-Magic - Where dreams become reality
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

So, I am here to post our new project we’ll be working on.
Code-Magic.

Code-Magic is a server which is still in development (early stage). We are looking to give players a good community
which is stable, free of trolling/flaming/whatsoever, and with a professional staff team.
Currently we have:

  • A set of minigames (Barrows, Tzhaar, duel arena)
  • Godwars
  • KBD
  • Corp
  • Tormented Demons
  • Frost Dragons
  • Bork
  • Strykewyrms
  • Grand Exchange (not a custom one)
  • 22 out of 24 skills are working (currently working on Construction and Dungeoneering)
  • Clans with Clan Chat
  • Drygore Weapons
  • Prayers and Curses
  • Custom Minigame (it is part of an event we will be running)
  • Quests (Working on a few to start with, continuing them depending on user feedback)
  • More to come, and ofcourse we’re not giving out everything just yet

Some Pictures:

Drygores


Grand Exchange

More to be added later

Credit Time!
Raw Envy - Base
Whoever deserves credit but didn’t get it, post here and i’ll add you.

OH, and before I forget,
Credits to Jacob and Mod Skyro from Rising Elements for TRYING TO STEAL OUR NAME.

Note: These people aren’t linked with us in any way.

Read full topic
